name: typescript-server
description: TypeScriptで作成したNode.jsサーバのテンプレート

scripts.clean-build: yarn run clean && yarn run build
scripts.cover: yarn run test && yarn run nyc report --reporter=html
scripts.dev:run: yarn run build && yarn run start
scripts.dev:test: yarn run test && yarn run nyc report --reporter=text
scripts.mocha: yarn run nyc mocha test/* test/**/*
scripts.prod:run: yarn run clean-build && NODE_ENV=production yarn run start
scripts.prod:test: NODE_ENV=production yarn run test && yarn run nyc report --reporter=text
